'''Hyper Potions''' is an American EDM band based in California, with Ian Tsuchiura as its only member. The band is known for composing remixes of video game soundtracks, notably composing music for the ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog]]'' franchise.

In ''Minecraft'', the band had composed a remix of "{{AMCM|Steve's Lava Chicken (song)|Steve's Lava Chicken}}" as [[Music Disc Lava Chicken]]. The band has also composed remixes of "[[Featherfall]]" and "[[Music Disc Precipice|Precipice]]" for the ''[[Minecraft: Pixel Genesis]]'' album, all the remixes in the album ''[[Minecraft: Triple Bundle]]'', and remixes of "[[Broken Clocks]]" and "[[Music Disc Tears|Tears]]" for the ''[[Minecraft: Pixel Drift]]'' album.

== Official ''Minecraft'' soundtracks ==
* ''[[Minecraft: Pixel Genesis]]'' (September 13, 2024)
* ''[[Minecraft: Triple Bundle]]'' (March 4, 2025)
* ''[[Music Disc Lava Chicken|Minecraft: Lava Chicken (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'' (June 25, 2025)
* ''[[Minecraft: Pixel Drift]]'' (September 3, 2025)
